metadata.title: CVE-2021-41141 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - low
metadata.description: PJSIP is a free and open source multimedia communication library written inthe C language implementing standard based protocols such as SIP, SDP, RTP,STUN, TURN, and ICE. In various parts of PJSIP, when error/failure occurs,it is found that the function returns without releasing the currently heldlocks. This could result in a system deadlock, which cause a denial ofservice for the users. No release has yet been made which contains thelinked fix commit. All versions up to an including 2.11.1 are affected.Users may need to manually apply the patch.

criterions.comment: ring package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
